column1: Remapping scheme for NNprobes 32-Poly2 (Ser nrs xxx)
Mapping as included in current file taken from ProbeRemapping_32Chan_Oct2016.ods. x y coords will be added later
Note probesites are arranged according to anatomical layout: probe ch23 is closest to headstage
column2: probe ch16 is at probe tip ie most ventral (at bottom of collumn)
column3: for each of these sites the corresponding Amplipex channel is shown.
